segments.text: Let me see . A roasted duck is $ 25 . A plate of pork is $ 6.50 . A bowl of beef is $ 7 . Two bottles of beer are $ 4 . That's a total of $ 42.50 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is $ 50 . Keep the change , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry sir . We take no tips here . Thank you all the same .
segments.speaker: S2
